definitions.definition: A trial in which the accused was subjected to a dangerous test (such as ducking in water), divine authority deciding the guilt of the accused. (See Trial by ordeal on  Wikipedia. Wikipedia )
The poisonous ordeal bean or Calabar bean

secondary_definitions: A trial in which the accused was subjected to a dangerous test (such as ducking in water), divine authority deciding the guilt of the accused. (See Trial by ordeal on  Wikipedia. Wikipedia )
The poisonous ordeal bean or Calabar bean
